item.title: Prime Focus Ltd Hits Intraday High with 8.74% Surge on 5 Feb 2026
item.description: Prime Focus Ltd surged to a new 52-week and all-time high of Rs 275.65 on 5 Feb 2026, marking a robust intraday performance with an 8.74% gain. The stock outperformed its sector and broader market indices amid heightened volatility and sustained buying interest. Time: 7 minutes ago

item.title: Cummins India Ltd. Hits Intraday High with 5.0% Surge on 5 Feb 2026
item.description: Cummins India Ltd. demonstrated robust intraday strength on 5 Feb 2026, surging to an intraday high of Rs 4,420.6, marking a 5.23% increase from its previous close. This performance stands out amid a broadly negative market backdrop, with the stock outperforming its sector and the Sensex index. Time: 7 minutes ago

item.title: Sakar Healthcare Ltd Reports Outstanding Quarterly Performance, Upgrades Financial Trend
item.description: Sakar Healthcare Ltd has delivered an exceptional quarterly performance for the December 2025 quarter, prompting an upgrade in its financial trend rating from positive to outstanding. The pharmaceutical and biotechnology company has demonstrated robust revenue growth, margin expansion, and improved capital efficiency, signalling a strong turnaround and enhanced investor confidence. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Kaynes Technology India Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Price Action

item.title: Indian Terrain Fashions Ltd Reports Very Positive Quarterly Financial Performance Amid Market Challenges

item.title: Cummins India Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Price Action
item.description: Cummins India Ltd. has witnessed a significant 15.22% increase in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and evolving positioning among traders. Despite a volatile trading session marked by an opening gap down and intraday swings, the stock has maintained a strong technical footing, trading above all major moving averages and nearing its 52-week high. This surge in open interest, coupled with volume patterns and price action, offers valuable insights into potential directional bets and investor sentiment in the compressors, pumps and diesel engines sector. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec 2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across Indian equities, as 1,295 companies declared results revealing a modest improvement in positive earnings surprises. While mid-cap stocks continue to outperform with a 53.0% beat rate, large caps lag behind at 36.0%, underscoring a divergence in corporate profitability and investor sentiment heading into 2026. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Filatex Fashions Ltd Sees Exceptional Volume Amid Mixed Price Action
item.description: Filatex Fashions Ltd (FILATFASH), a micro-cap player in the Garments & Apparels sector, emerged as one of the most actively traded stocks on 5 Feb 2026, registering a remarkable volume of 2.79 crore shares. Despite a stagnant price movement, the surge in trading activity signals heightened investor interest amid a broader market downturn, with the Sensex and sector indices declining by 0.56% and 1.09% respectively. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Gretex Corporate Services Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
